title: Blog Platform Blogs Data (Batch)
description: Schema for a batch of 5 blog posts. Multiple files following this schema can be merged by concatenating their 'blogs' arrays.

replies.description: Array of nested replies (can go up to 5 levels deep, but most commonly 1-2 levels). Each reply can have its own replies.

blogs.description: Array of exactly 5 blog posts with nested comments

author_username.description: Username of the blog author (must match a user from the users file)

subject.description: Blog post title/subject - MUST BE UNIQUE across ALL blog files

description.description: Compelling description/summary of the blog post (50-500 characters recommended)

content.description: Full blog post content in Markdown format (3000-5000 characters required for high-quality, in-depth content)

tags.description: Array of tag strings for categorizing the blog

comments.description: Array of root-level comments on the blog post (root comment authors must NOT be the blog author)
